overview:
Javier Rincon is the CMO of 6Wunderkinder. He is responsible for leading marketing actions, together with his team, that will extend the remarkable growth of 6Wunderkinder’s products.

Prior to joining 6Wunderkinder, Javier co-founded Lowffer, a mobile start-up focused on local deal comparison and social shopping. He has also worked on product and marketing with startups at La Salle incubator, managed deal flow for Keiretsu Investors Forum and worked at Oracle Consulting. Javier obtained an MEng in Systems Engineering from Loughborough University in the UK.
